text: Stage in Hell. Sacher-Masoch approaches the Marquis de Sade and, masochistically, cries out: -Peace, peace! Pinch me, please! The Marquis de Sade raises the baton, he will strike him, but he is a little hesitant and, with cruel mouth and cruel eyes, he sadistically says: - No. FIN
title: Sadismo y masoquismo
author: Enrique Anderson Imbert
